title: Bits and bytes. Parts 1-12
creator_credit: Time-Life Video, TV Ontario, Denise Boiteau, David Stansfield and Stuart Beecroft
brief_description: Part 1. ‘Getting started’. Part 2. “Ready made programs’. Part 3. ‘How programs work’. Part 4. ‘Storing information’. Part 5. ‘Communication between computers’. Part 6.’Computer languages’. Part 7. ‘Computer assisted instruction’. Part 8. ‘Learning objectives’. Part 9. ‘Computer Graphics’. Part 10 ‘Computer music’. Part 11. ‘Computers at work’. Part 12 ‘What next’. Based on the Apple II series computer, and IBM, there are sound basic explanations about basic computer functions and programs.
